casebody.data:
Frank Freeman RUIZ, Appellant,
v.
Annie FREEMAN, Appellee. No. 3D17-2580 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District. Opinion filed July 25, 2018 Frank Freeman Ruiz, in proper person. ADR Miami LLC, and Juan Ramirez, Jr., for appellee. Before SUAREZ, FERNANDEZ, and LINDSEY, JJ. PER CURIAM.

Affirmed. Applegate v. Barnett Bank of Tallahassee , 377 So.2d 1150 (Fla. 1979).
